author: rgrabowski
msg: Added missing cacheHit parameter to RaisePostEvent.

author: rgrabowski
msg: Expose ConfigurationSetting object in BaseTest to allow StatementNamespaceTest to run only when UseStatementNamespaces=true.
Added PostStatementEventArgs.CacheHit property that is set when the ResultObject comes from cache.
Added TestJIRA242WithCacheAndPostStatementEventArgs test case for new PostStatementEventArgs.CacheHit property.

author: rgrabowski
msg: Call Trim() before setting the CommandText of a stored procedure call to ensure the store procedure name is not prefixed with whitespace.
